element.name: Cardiac Arrest
element.definition: Indication of the presence of a cardiac arrest at any time during this EMS event.
element.v3Comment:
This element is a component of the Utstein Cardiac Arrest Criteria.
If this EMS event is for an interfacility transfer of a patient with a recent history of a cardiac arrest with ROSC, and who does not experience another cardiac arrest during transport, then do not document Cardiac Arrest (eArrest.01) with "Yes, Prior to EMS Arrival".
